data.message: Is proof really dead did anyone see his dead body I hear that out lives r written out 4 us b4 we live it and someone as talented as proof dead I don't believe it I remember back in the day as a rapper or underground rapper saying u got shot or died would boost ur cred and music sales I have seen real footage of singers entertainers that don't want to be famous anymore that people fans think they are dead when they are walking around like everyday Joes it's a whole conspiracy
